title: How do I play vs Hextech?
body:
If I position myself away, assassin comps eat me alive. If I huddle, I get ass blasted and there's a possibility that I get AOE'd by Jinx's broken ass. 
 So what do?

replies.body: I normally make sure there is one hex between items, then only one item holder gets whacked.
Build a PD or two and separate your champs.
you wait til they patch 2 hextech.  right now this 2 hextech and noble meta is horrific
